name: Italian-style Chicken Breasts
description: Packed with protein, this recipe goes with pasta, rice, or you can even add it to a crusty bun for burger night!
preparation: Lightly spray frying pan with vegetable oil.
Cook chicken breasts over medium high heat until browned on both sides.
In a small mixing bowl, whisk tomato sauce with Pesto Herbs. Spoon sauce over chicken breasts and sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese.
Cover and bake in pre-heated oven for 15 minutes.
tips: Serve with pasta or rice, or in a large crusty bun as an Italian style chicken burger.
